Signs typed data using the inner client.

## Import

```ts
import { AlchemyServerSigner } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Parameters

### params

`TypedDataDefinition<TTypedData, TPrimaryType>`
The typed data to sign

## Returns

`Promise<Hex>`
The signed typed data
